snippet: A 16-year-old boy accused of setting a mattress fire that led to the death of a veteran police officer was indicted on a murder charge on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Murder Charge for Teen in Police Officer's Death
headline.main: Murder Charge for Teen in Police Officer's Death

lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old boy accused of setting a mattress fire that led to the death of a veteran police officer was indicted on a murder charge on Friday.
